title: Memory Leak from LoL
body: When im normally using my PC Laptop Memory usage sits at a comfortable 20-25%, When I Open league it jumps to 40%, but then it just climbs, and after around 3 games it reaches 80-90% and my computer starts hanging itself. This is only happening on league. I have tried reinstalling league and all.

replies.body:
Strange. League should only use the same amount of RAM it uses from the start, as it loads *all* of its game data at the start of the game to reduce any frame-lag one might get in game.

A memory leak wouldn't be too far-fetched. You've already repaired and reinstalled, so it wouldn't (likely) be a corrupt file or anything.

What OS are you on? Do you use page filing?
dw dude its not like they respond to our post like these at all, try your luck with a support ticket
Rioters generally forum lurk a lot, i suspect the correct Rioter to address this issue will stumble across my post soon enough.
My Paged Pool Memory increases while i play, and doesn't decrease after a game, it just continues to increase until it hangs. Only doing this while playing your game.
